metrics.name: Residual Drift
metrics.description: Measures systematic drift in temperature residuals over time

metrics.name: Variance Ratio
metrics.description: Ratio of observed variance to expected variance in temperature readings

metrics.name: Residual Whiteness
metrics.description: Tests if residuals are white noise (no autocorrelation)

metrics.name: Residual Flatline
metrics.description: Detects periods where temperature readings are unchanging

metrics.name: Defrost Apex
metrics.description: Peak temperature reached during defrost cycles

metrics.name: Post Defrost Recovery
metrics.description: Time and rate of temperature recovery after defrost

metrics.name: Defrost Internal Error
metrics.description: Internal errors detected during defrost cycle execution

metrics.name: Defrost Duration Overrun
metrics.description: Cases where defrost duration exceeded expected time

metrics.name: Post Defrost Slope
metrics.description: Rate of temperature change after defrost completes

metrics.name: Door Open Stats
metrics.description: Statistics on door open events and duration
